# Pull Request

## Description

Please include a summary of the changes and the related issue. Explain the
motivation behind this PR and how it addresses the problem.

Fixes #(issue number)

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to
      change)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Code refactoring

## How Has This Been Tested?

Describe the tests that you ran to verify your changes. Please also provide any
relevant details for reproduction, if applicable.

- [ ] Unit tests added/updated
- [ ] Integration tests added/updated
- [ ] Manual testing performed

## Testing Checklist

- [ ] All tests pass locally (`uv run pytest`)
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines (`uv run task check`)
- [ ] No new warnings generated
- [ ] Coverage maintained or improved

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

## Screenshots (if applicable)

Add any relevant screenshots or GIFs demonstrating the change.

Add any other context about the PR here.
